control.description-key: VATNumberValidator allows you to validate the entry of a VAT Number by checking it with the European Commission and retrieving, depending on the configuration, the address and the name of the company.

property.name: isVatNumberValid
property.description-key: Boolean field filled-in with the output validity of the VAT Number.

property.name: companyName
property.description-key: Field that will be used to insert the name of the found company.

property.name: companyAddress
property.description-key: Field that will be used to insert the address of the found company.

property.name: displayDialog
property.description-key: Specifies whether you want to display error message(s) in the following cases.

value.name: NotFound
value.description-key: Display message only if no result found.

value.name: ApiError
value.description-key: Display message only if service is unavailable or crashed.

value.name: Both
value.description-key: Display message only if service is unavailable or crashed and if no result found.
